questionTitle: Which of the following creates a custom search utility for a particular Web site?
questionExplanation: Custom Search lets you programmatically build and manage custom search engines for your site.

questionOption1: Yahoo search is the most popular search engine on the Web
questionOption2: Google Ad Planner is a free media planning tool that can help you identify websites your audience is likely to visit so you can make better-informed advertising decisions
questionOption3: Google AdSense is a free media planning tool that can help you identify websites your audience is likely to visit so you can make better-informed advertising decisions
questionExplanation: Google search is the most popular search engine on the Web.

questionTitle: Which of the following product searches Web by topics?
questionExplanation: The Google Web Directory integrates Google’s search technology with OpenDirectoryProject pages to create a tool for finding information on the web.

questionTitle: Which of the following is an online atlas and mapping service with mashups?
questionExplanation: Google Earth lets you fly anywhere on Earth to view satellite imagery, maps, terrain, 3D buildings, from galaxies in outer space to the canyons of the ocean.

questionOption1: Google Alerts are email updates of the latest relevant Google results (web, news, etc.) based on your choice of query or topic
questionOption2: Google Analytics makes it easy to improve your results online
questionOption3: Google Base is Google search technology focused on blogs
questionExplanation: Blog Search is Google search technology focused on blogs.

questionTitle: Which of the following indexes content on your local drive for fast searches?
questionExplanation: Google Desktop is a computer program with desktop search capabilities, created by Google for Linux, Apple Mac OS X, and Microsoft Windows systems.

questionTitle: Google _______ is a collection of applications and utilities under development and testing.
questionExplanation: Google Labs was a page created by Google to demonstrate and test new projects.

questionTitle: Which of the following is photo-editing and management software?
questionExplanation: Organize and edit your photos using Picasa.

questionTitle: Which of the following product allows users to create 3D models and share them with others?
questionExplanation: SketchUp is a 3D modeling software that’s easy to learn and incredibly fun to use.

questionTitle: Which of the following gives statistical information on different search terms?
questionExplanation: Google Trends is a public web facility of Google Inc. based on Google Search.
